R E S U M E O B JE CT I V E 
 3+ years of experience in developing web application and API using C#, .NET. 
 Experience with n-tier application architecture and AGILE Development practices. 
 Hands-on experience with ASP.NET MVC, NET Core. 
 Must have Design Patterns and understanding of object-oriented design principles 
 Having Experience in database design and tools (i.e. Oracle), stored procedures, PL/SQL, data modeling, 
information architecture. 
 Proficiency in web based languages: JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5  
 Having Experience in integration technologies such as XML, Web Services, etc. 
 Understanding in CQRS & Clean Architecture. 
 Good time management, communication, problem solving skills. 
Sernior .NET Developer 
PROJECT HANDLE 
Indo Trans Logistics 
Project #1 
Transportation Management System 
Team Size: 8 
Role(s)  Developer 
Tools 
Visual Studio, Visual Code, SSMS,DBForge, Git, SVN 
Techniques 
C#, SOAP, .Net core, Angular 6. 
Description 
Making eTMS become a product that be more friendly, help BU cut-down 
cost operation.  
Designing for international and high volume logistics company. 
Responsibilities 
• Building project template and support and upgrade system core. 
• Creating, building and improving Angular component base on TS and 
HTML file. 
• Creating, building and improving Micro module API base on .NET Core. 
• Meeting with business analysts and teammates to get clear requirements. 
• Developing based on technical documents. 
• Reporting to Team Leader. 
• Participating in R&D, training, knowledge sharing activities. 
• Maintenance system. 
Nhat Cuong Software

Online Pubic Service System 
Team Size: 20 
Role(s)  Developer 
Tools 
Visual Studio, Visual Code, SSMS, DBForge, SVN 
Techniques 
C#, SOAP, .Net MVC, Singnalr 
Description 
Online public service software is one of the applications of information 
technology in administrative reform, towards building an electronic 
government system and smart cities. 
Responsibilities 
• Building project templates and supporting and upgrade system core. 
• Meeting with business analysts and teammates to get clear requirements. 
• Code, implement, unit test, maintain and troubleshoot web application. 
• Reporting to Team Leader. 
• Assisting Team Leader in reviewing work results of low-level members. 
• Maintenancing system. 
EDUCATION

city). 
CERTIFICATION 
 Completed the MCSA course organized by Newstart center on July- 4th 2012. 
AVALIBILITY

Logistics  And  E-Commerce System 
Team Size: 5 
Role(s)  Developer 
Tools 
Visual Studio SSMS,Git 
Techniques 
C#, SOAP, .Net MVC, Singnalr 
Description 
Making the web application using API or crawl to get product information of 
information commercial technology websites for logistic system of company.

• Read and implement documents from e-commerce API such as Rakuten, 
Yahoo, Amazon to get data. 
Building mini chat system base on .NET and using singnalr. 
Implement and bind data base HTML from designer.  
• Meeting with business analysts and teammates to get clear requirements. 
• Code, implement and troubleshoot web application. 
• Writing daily reports.
